name: Space Tooth Vs. Space Candy: In Space
name_original: Space Tooth Vs. Space Candy: In Space
description:
It's a shmup where you're a tooth shooting toothpaste at candies.

Yup.

Controls:

F4 for fullscreen.

Arrow keys to move Z or SPACE to shoot.

You can also use a controller.

Made for Gamemaker Jam

Sound effects made with bfxr:
http://www.bfxr.net/
